Book an Appointment

Things that I enjoy to do in the summer around Ontario!

Biking in the greater Ottawa Area

Ottawa has many biking trails with a variety of lengths and difficulty, appealing to everyone! With it's stunning views and different trails, it’ a great adventure any day of the week. One of the greatest places I love to take my bike!

Canada’s Wonderland

Surprise… I’m an adrenaline junkie!! Canada’s Wonderland is the largest theme park in Canada. With over 70 rides and a huge water park it’s the perfect day trip. My obsession with roller coasters combined with low admission fees makes it a very affordable and fun attraction for the summer!

Sandbanks Winery

To stay healthy I love to drink grape juice!

Located in the small town of Wellington Ontario, is a beautiful winery and amazing experience. Looking for a wine tour/tasting? One of my favourite destinations is Sandbanks, located in Southern Ontario!

Food Truck Festival | July 29-August 1

I love trying new foods and downtown Toronto is hosting a food truck festival. What better way to spend a hot summer day/weekend trying great food supporting small businesses. And to think I only have to take 5 steps between each food truck is amazing!

Outdoor Concerts

Ontario is home to many great outdoor music festivals with my love for music and the atmosphere that an outdoor concert brings, makes it a great way to listen to great music. You never know when your favourite music artist is coming to town!!!
